com.cs5300.proj1a.servlets

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.cs5300.proj1a.servlets.SessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/SessionManager")
public class SessionManager
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

    Servlet implementation class SessionManager

    This class extends HttpServlet and handles all refresh/replace/logout requests along with session maintenance

    Author:
    kt466
